casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Willie BROWN, Jr. No. 565A83-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2006. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, Seth Edwards, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of April 2006 by Defendant for Stay of Execution:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of April 2006."
